scripts.build: pnpm --dir packages/tui run build && pnpm --dir packages/ai run build && pnpm --dir packages/agent run build && pnpm --dir packages/coding-agent run build
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "ai,agent,coding-agent,tui" --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow,red,magenta" "pnpm --dir packages/ai run dev" "pnpm --dir packages/agent run dev" "pnpm --dir packages/coding-agent run dev" "pnpm --dir packages/tui run dev"
scripts.dev:tsc: concurrently --names "ai,agent,coding-agent,tui" --prefix-colors "cyan,yellow,red,magenta" "pnpm --dir packages/ai run dev" "pnpm --dir packages/agent run dev" "pnpm --dir packages/coding-agent run dev" "pnpm --dir packages/tui run dev"
scripts.version:patch: pnpm -r exec npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && pnpm install
scripts.version:minor: pnpm -r exec npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && pnpm install
scripts.version:major: pnpm -r exec npm version major --no-git-tag-version && pnpm install
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build && pnpm run check
scripts.publish: pnpm run prepublishOnly && pnpm -r publish --access public
scripts.publish:dry: pnpm run prepublishOnly && pnpm -r publish --access public --dry-run
